ResearchProjectDef.label: ashlands natives farming
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to sow some of the plants native to the ashlands. These plants have adapted to ash storms, they take no damage during them, and several are capable of growing during them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fragile ashlands natives farming
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to sow some of the plants native to the ashlands. These plants are fragile, and take damage during ash storms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: exotic flowers growing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to sow the exotic, and very beautiful, flowers commonly found growing in Mournhold.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ashlands cuisine preparation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the preparation of certain food items commonly utilised by ashlanders.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wasteful muck refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the refining of muck at a drug lab. This process is extremely wasteful.

ResearchProjectDef.label: inefficient muck refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the refining of muck at a drug lab using netch jelly, somewhat inefficient.

ResearchProjectDef.label: efficient muck refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the refining of muck at a drug lab using kwama eggs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: weaponized retching netch gas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the production of retching netch gas IEDs and shells. Release a gas on explosion that makes those caught in the radius vomit uncontrollably.

ResearchProjectDef.label: engineered ash resistance
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a high-tech implant that allows unhindered breathing during ash storms. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
